body.p: Powell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Richard Morton and Elizabeth Morton. Married to Mary Jane Morton. Father of Sarah E. Morton, Nancy M. Morton, Richard B. Morton, Louisa Morton, Jency T. Morton, John W. Morton, and Margaret C. Morton. Resident of Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Powell County in 1860.
